text: avaru kadeganisidare (nimage tilidirali), navenu nim'mannu avara raksakaragi nemisilla. Nim'ma meliruvudu (satyavannu) talupisi biduva hone matra. Navu manusyanige nam'ma kadeyinda enadaru anugrahavannu dayapalisidare avanu a kuritu sambhramisa todaguttane. Adare, avarade kaigala galikeya karana avarigenadaru ahita sambhavisidare â€“ manavanu khandita krtaghnanagi biduttane
